tasks.label: Build Test: Debug C++
tasks.command: cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -D STRINGZILLA_BUILD_TEST=1 -B build_debug && cmake --build build_debug --config Debug --target stringzilla_test_cpp20

tasks.label: Build Test: Debug Parallel C++
tasks.command: cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -D STRINGZILLA_BUILD_TEST=1 -B build_debug && cmake --build build_debug --config Debug --target stringzillas_test_cpp20

tasks.label: Build Test: Debug CUDA
tasks.command: cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -D STRINGZILLA_BUILD_TEST=1 -B build_debug && cmake --build build_debug --config Debug --target stringzillas_test_cu20

tasks.label: Build Benchmarks: Debug
tasks.command: cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -D STRINGZILLA_BUILD_TEST=0 -D STRINGZILLA_BUILD_BENCHMARK=1 -B build_debug && cmake --build build_debug --config Debug

tasks.label: Build Benchmarks: Release
